resources.string:
Hi, my name is Wills. 

I love playing games. 

Not newest or famous games, is the old classic games that can coop. 
Quite Sad anyone dont like the old classic game is because graphic too ugly. 

The much game I tried to play is Warcraft 3 (Classic Version). 
I had tried to play this game 20 hours before. 
Because this not just a game. 

This also a game engine for develop a fun game. 

I'll be happy to introduce you this game.
